userdoc.notice: Base blockchain module for crime registry records.  Objectives:  1️⃣ Tamper-proof crime record anchoring  2️⃣ Role-based access (Police, Forensic, Admin)  3️⃣ Full event audit trail  4️⃣ Off-chain encrypted IPFS linkage  5️⃣ Consent tracking for compliance
